description: Qwen3-Coder is Alibaba's most powerful open-source coding model. It is a 480B-parameter MoE model with 35B active parameters per token, instruction-tuned for code generation and tool use. It supports native 256K token context (extensible to 1M with Yarn for repository-scale tasks). Qwen3-Coder excels at 'agentic coding,' integrating with tools like compilers or browsers via a special function-call format. By default it does not output chain-of-thought (no <think> blocks) to ensure deterministic code responses. It achieved top-tier results on agentic code benchmarks, comparable to Claude 4.5 on code reasoning tasks. The model is Apache 2.0 licensed and can be self-hosted (8 experts of 160 are used per query). API pricing via Alibaba Cloud is low (~$0.8/M input, $4/M output tokens), and it supports caching for repeated prompts. Qwen3-Coder is ideal for building coding assistants that can plan and execute multi-step programming tasks autonomously.
